name: ProcrastinaTHOR
description:
This is a REALLY hard game made to be played according to the music timing. You can shoot only if you press to shoot when the blue waves (in the UI) reach the ship's panel marker. 

Left blue wave controls your shots with the left mouse button. Right blue wave controls your shots with the right mouse button.

For now there are 3 levels of difficulty in this same map.

This game was developped in 48h during the UFPE Game Jam, in Recife. The theme of the jam was "Time". The game was made to inspire the old style arcade sensation inside the player, but with touches of modernity.

TEAM:

Programmers: Marcelino Borges, Gustavo Mesel 3D Artists: Caio Filizola 2D Artist: Carlos Eduardo, Matheus Alencar SFX & Music: Nara Araújo Manager: Lucas Pires Game Designer: the whole team

Made with Unreal Engine 4.
